mapper.insert: insert into iym_inventory_type (id, name, code, state, required, sellable) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{required,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sellable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update iym_inventory_type set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, required = #{required,jdbcType=BIT}, sellable = #{sellable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, state, required, sellable from iym_inventory_type
